main event: Two witnesses observed a UFO with red, blue, and green lights flying around the sky in Bellbrook, Ohio for about 10 minutes on October 25, 1966.
interesting points: The object moved in a zig-zag pattern as if surveying the ground below., The object's color changed from red to white to blue to green., One of the witnesses thought they were observing a satellite., The observers described the object's motion as erratic and noteworthy., The observation was made on a clear night.
sighted object: UFO with multi-colored lights in the sky
